articles.title: The Bin Store Opens New Location in Snellville, GA
articles.summary: The Bin Store Brands has opened a new location, The Bin Store Snellville, in Snellville, Georgia. The store specializes in Amazon returns, Target overstock, and major retailer liquidations, offering merchandise at up to 99% off retail prices. The Bin Store operates on a daily pricing system and donates remaining items to local charities weekly.

articles.title: Lidl to sell Thermomix dupe on the middle aisle that is £1,050 cheaper than the original
articles.author: Celine Marshall
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Monsieur Cuisine Smart, a Thermomix dupe, for £299 for Lidl Plus customers starting September 4th. This multi-functional kitchen appliance includes WiFi for recipe updates, video cooking, voice control, integrated scales, and various cooking functions. Lidl also offers the Silvercrest Kitchen Tools Stand Mixer for £49.99 and the 15L Salter air fryer for £79.99.

articles.title: Mandy's Gourmet Salads opens up first Ottawa location in the Glebe
articles.author: Robert Hiltz
articles.summary: Mandy's Gourmet Salads, a Montreal-based chain, opened its first location on Bank Street on August 15. The company expressed their excitement and welcomed customers with greens and good vibes.

articles.title: HONOR introduces HONOR Magic V5 foldable at a premium regional event in Dubai
articles.summary: HONOR launched the HONOR Magic V5, a foldable smartphone, featuring a durable design, advanced camera capabilities, and AI-powered features, with a pre-order price of $1799. Alongside, HONOR unveiled the MagicPad 3 tablet ($799) and the MagicBook Art 14 2025 laptop ($1699), expanding its AI device ecosystem, both available for pre-order as well.

articles.title: TikTok's favorite hair tool got an upgrade: Shop the new Wavytalk Blowout Boost Grande
articles.author: Kyley Warren
articles.summary: Wavytalk has launched the Blowout Boost Grande, an upgraded version of their popular Blowout Boost hair styling tool. The Grande features a larger barrel, heated bristles, and five heat settings designed to create voluminous, salon-quality hairstyles at home. This new launch from Wavytalk upgrades the cult-favorite Blowout Boost with a larger barrel and more tailored heat settings.

articles.title: ‘Black Ops 7' Trailer Pushes ‘Call of Duty' to Marketing Extremes With Fake Magazine Covers and Bogus IPO
articles.author: Variety
articles.summary: Activision is employing a new marketing tactic for the upcoming release of "Call of Duty: Black Ops 7." This is the latest marketing effort for the product.

articles.title: Looking for the viral spin scrubber? Walmart has it for 71% off right now
articles.author: Ashley Dill
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the SZRSTH Electric Spin Scrubber at a discounted price of $25.59, a reduction from $90. The SZRSTH Electric Spin Scrubber features three adjustable speeds, eight detachable brushes, extendable handle and a battery life of up to 3 hours.

articles.title: HONOR introduces HONOR Magic V5 foldable at a premium regional event in Dubai
articles.author: Saudi Gazette
articles.summary: HONOR launched the HONOR Magic V5, a foldable smartphone.

articles.title: Sam Altman Admits OpenAI "Totally Screwed Up"
articles.author: Futurism
articles.summary: OpenAI launched its hotly anticipated GPT-5 model, replacing all previous models. This move triggered outrage among users, teaching OpenAI a lesson about product upgrades.

articles.title: Melbourne's most famous coffee is magic. But who gets to claim it?
articles.author: David Astle
articles.summary: Newtown S.C., owned by Cate Della Bosca, introduced 'Magic Coffee,' a double-ristretto-three-quarter-flat-white, in collaboration with Zenon Misko. The coffee has expanded to locations including 7-Eleven, Marks & Spencer, and Karo Coffee Roasters in Bangkok, showcasing its adoption as a new product internationally.

articles.title: Talkio Mobile opens flagship service centre at Ntinda Complex
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Talkio Mobile launched a new flagship service center at Ntinda Complex in Kampala, Uganda, offering services like SIM provisioning, eSIM solutions, and mobile payment options. This new center aims to improve customer experience and support Uganda's digital transformation initiatives.

articles.title: This New U.S. Bed Bath & Beyond Home Store Bears A Striking Resemblance To A Similarly-Named Chain Of Bed Bath Stores in New Zealand
articles.author: Jason Miller
articles.summary: Beyond Inc. is reintroducing Bed Bath & Beyond Home stores in the U.S., with a new small-format design in partnership with Kirkland's Inc. The first store has opened in Brentwood, Tennessee, with plans for additional locations, resembling the Bed Bath & Beyond Ltd NZ stores. These stores will primarily focus on towels, pillows, and home goods, reflecting a shift in merchandising strategy.

articles.title: You Can Get a Heinz Ketchup Smoothie in Denver Right Now—but Should You?
articles.author: Jessica Giles
articles.summary: Smoothie King launched the Heinz Tomato Ketchup Smoothie in select cities, including Denver, on August 6. The smoothie features Heinz ketchup, acai sorbet, apple juice, strawberries, and raspberries and is available as a limited release in a 20-ounce cup for $5.70.

articles.title: Auto review: The 2025 Mercedes-AMG G63 is unlike anything else — thank goodness
articles.author: The Daily Gazette
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz is marketing its Geländewagen, known as the G-Wagen, as the 2025 Mercedes-Benz G-Class. This SUV maintains its recognizable design.

articles.title: NordVPN now alerts Android users in U.S. before potential spam calls arrive
articles.author: Dan Mitchell
articles.summary: NordVPN has launched a new Scam Call Protection feature for Android users in the U.S. This feature instantly analyzes incoming calls and displays a warning label, helping users identify and avoid potential scam calls, even when the VPN is not active.

articles.title: Parachute expands New Baby Collection: Shop crib sheets, hooded towels
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: Parachute has launched its new Baby Collection, featuring items designed for both baby and parent comfort. The collection includes light, breathable crib sheets and organic hooded towels. New shoppers can also get a 15% discount on their first order.

articles.title: I replaced my Windows PC with Lenovo's SteamOS handheld - and didn't regret it
articles.author: Cesar Cadenas
articles.summary: Lenovo has introduced the Legion Go S model, which features a lightweight, gaming-focused SteamOS instead of Windows 11. This change aims to provide an enhanced gaming experience on the handheld device.

articles.title: From Everyday to Extreme, toolant Launches Brand New Line of Hand Tools
articles.author: The Eagle-Tribune
articles.summary: toolant, a tool and accessories brand, made an announcement.

articles.title: This Doo-Dad Has Given Me The Cleanest Hair Of My Life
articles.author: Haley Zovickian
articles.summary: The Heeta shampoo scrubber and scalp massager, available on Amazon for $5.99, offers gentle silicone bristles for cleansing grease, buildup, and flakes, providing a massage-like experience. It is designed for all hair lengths and types and comes in 27 colors.

articles.title: 5 best summer duvets 2025 UK, lightweight and cooling bedding for heatwave relief
articles.author: Holly Gonsalves
articles.summary: Silentnight launched the Summer Fresh 4.5 tog duvet, featuring lightweight design, temperature regulation, and anti-allergy properties. Soak and Sleep offers the Soft As Down Microfibre duvet, known for its luxurious feel and zipped storage bag. Emma introduced the 4-Seasons Duvet, a versatile 3-in-1 duvet with different tog layers for year-round use.

articles.title: Oral-B's Genius X toothbrush has never been cheaper, but how good is its AI?
articles.author: Jon Axworthy
articles.summary: Oral-B launched the Genius X electric toothbrush in 2019, featuring AI technology to track brushing in real-time and provide coaching via a connected app. Since its launch, the price of Genius X has significantly decreased from around £400 to £64.99.

articles.title: Breathtaking new film ‘that needs to be seen' quietly added to Netflix
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Netflix released a new original production. This launch was done without significant publicity.

articles.title: WAVLINK Launches Groundbreaking Thunderbolt 5 Docking Station, Unlocking Unprecedented Connectivity
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: WAVLINK announced the full market release of its new Thunderbolt™ 5 Docking Station. This docking station is engineered to provide high bandwidth and empower users by unlocking the full potential of their devices. The new product aims to create a more efficient digital experience.

articles.title: Twelve hours, three coverages, no recharge: The Honor 400 Pro 5G blue carpet stress test
articles.author: Ed Uy
articles.summary: Honor launched the Honor 400 Pro 5G, a flagship phone featuring an ultra-clear 200MP camera, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, and a 6,000mAh battery. The Honor 400 Pro 5G is available in Lunar Grey and Midnight Black colorways and is priced at P32,999. The device is designed for creators, journalists, and mobile gamers, offering features like AI-to-Image and enhanced imaging capabilities.

articles.title: This Chinese company just unveiled an SSD almost as small as a SIM card
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Biwin, a digital storage technology company, has unveiled Mini SSD, a new data format storage solution. Mini SSD is powered by PCIe Gen4X2 and NVMe 1.4 technologies, with transfer speeds of 3,700 MB/s (read) and 3,400 MB/s (write), and it will be available in capacities ranging from 512 GB to 2TB. Two consumer tech products, the GPD Win 5 gaming handheld and the OneNetbook OneXPlayer Super X PC, have been announced with native support for Mini SSD.

articles.title: I can't help be feel like Samsung's S Pen is on its way out
articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.summary: Samsung introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable smartphone with larger displays but lacking S Pen support due to its thinner design. The company previously removed Bluetooth-enabled features from the S Pen with the Galaxy S25 Ultra, citing low usage. These changes raise questions about the long-term future of the S Pen within Samsung's product lineup.

articles.title: Samsung's S Pen seems like its on life support
articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.summary: Samsung introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7 with a thinner and lighter design but without S Pen support.  The company also released the Galaxy S25 Ultra, which has a limited number of S Pen features. These changes indicate a potential shift in Samsung's approach to stylus integration in their smartphones.

articles.title: DYADICA Expands Brand Strategy Practice with NEXTGEN AI and New Media Expertise
articles.summary: SXTC Global Brand Consulting's DYADICA has expanded its brand strategy practice by integrating NEXTGEN AI capabilities and new media strategy and implementation expertise.  This expansion includes AI-Augmented Brand Strategy, AI enhanced brand and design/creative efficiency, New Media Implementation, and Consumer and Market Intelligence Systems to help brands dominate new and legacy markets.  DYADICA's Small Business Foundation also provides startups and SMEs access to world-class brand strategy.

articles.title: New Kindle leak could be bad news for the Colorsoft
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Amazon is potentially launching a new color e-reader called 'Kindle Petit Color'. This prototype may feature detachable bezels, 'progressive colors', and an improved color display compared to the Kindle Colorsoft. The device is rumored to be a smaller, more colorful alternative to existing Kindle models.

articles.title: Palland is Palworld's low-effort twin, and somehow it made it on Nintendo Switch
articles.author: Olga Racinowska
articles.summary: BoggySoft launched a new survival game called "Palland" on Nintendo Switch. Palland is described as a game with base-building mechanics, however it is considered a direct copy of the popular game "Palworld".

articles.title: The New Face of Discounts: How QR Codes Are Revolutionizing the Way We Save
articles.author: Thandiubani
articles.summary: Various companies are now using QR codes to provide discounts on their products or services. In Nigeria, fast-food chains, supermarkets and Fashion Brands are offering discounts through QR codes that are scanned on apps, circulars, and product labels. The use of AI and consumer data is expected to personalize discounts through QR codes even further to enhance customer loyalty.

articles.title: Wild Video Shows Humanoid Robot Effortlessly Folding Laundry
articles.summary: Figure's humanoid robot, Figure 02, has gained the new skill of folding laundry autonomously using an end-to-end neural network. The robot's folding ability demonstrates advancements in dexterous manipulation tasks for humanoid robots, achieved without significant changes to its Helix visual language system but with a new dataset.

articles.title: This 'all-in-one' cleaning tool is normally $400, but it's on sale for $50 on Amazon Canada (that's 88% off!)
articles.author: Yahoo Canada Shopping Editors
articles.summary: The Electric Spin Scrubber is a cleaning tool available on Amazon Canada with a current 88% discount. It features eight detachable brushes, a powerful motor with two speeds, and an extendable handle. Customer reviews highlight its effectiveness for cleaning tiles, bathtubs, and other surfaces, while some note its limitations for deep cleaning.

articles.title: Young people shine in "AI for All: China-ASEAN" competition
articles.summary: Shanghai Rongyin Technology Co., Ltd. launched "Baobao", an AI mascot with interactive functions that integrates cultural elements and multilingual ASEAN interactions. The AI mascot gained recognition through the "AI for All: China-ASEAN" competition, opening up broader market opportunities for the company. The competition also supports cross-border e-commerce ventures using AI tools to create multilingual livestream sales videos.

articles.title: Bold & Beautiful?
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Audi is launching the Q5 Bold Edition in the mid-sized luxury SUV segment. This product introduction aims to improve Audi's market presence in this area.

articles.title: Want a robot lawn mower? Same. Save up to $350 at Mammotion's epic 9th anniversary sale
articles.author: David Hoffman
articles.summary: Mammotion is celebrating its 9th anniversary with a sale on its robot lawn mowers, including the Luba 2 AWD Series, Luba Mini AWD Series, Yuka Series, and Yuka Mini Series, offering discounts up to $350. The Luba series focuses on power and lawn coverage, while the Yuka series provides a 2-in-1 lawn care experience with sweeping functionality.

articles.title: Welcome to Guardian TV
articles.summary: Guardian TV (G-TV) launched a television platform for the out-of-home market, partnering with brands like Denny's and Golden Corral to place screens in their stores. G-TV delivers daily news, weather, sports highlights, and commercials for local businesses, generating revenue through content and offering targeted marketing campaigns.

articles.title: How To Navigate The New Frontier Of Market Segmentation
articles.author: Nancy Clark
articles.summary: Verizon Value is redefining the prepaid wireless landscape through customer-centric innovation. They are offering customers a five-year price guarantee, access to a premium network with priority data, and free 5G phones when customers switch to their 5G plan. These actions reflect updates and introductions of new services aimed at personalization and customer loyalty.

articles.title: Here's Where the Wonder is coming in Navy Yard – What's the early Word on the 14th Street spot?
articles.author: Prince
articles.summary: Wonder is expanding its locations, following the 14th Street opening with new spots in West End, College Park, Cleveland Park, Reston, Franconia, and Navy Yard. The Navy Yard location will be at 111 N Street, SE. The expansion introduces the food service product of "Wonder" to new locations.

articles.title: Happy Indian Independence day sale  India, US, NL, FR
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: SmokyHosts offers VPS hosting solutions to empower websites to deliver exceptional user experiences. The company aims to improve website performance in the competitive online landscape.

articles.title: How To Design A Focused MVP That Proves Value Fast
articles.author: Expert Panel®
articles.summary: Varun Milind Kulkarni from Microsoft is advising to Use AI-powered user journey mapping to identify the single highest-impact moment in your customer's workflow and build the MVP around that only. Ajit Sahu from Walmart is advising to define a single, clear user problem and build only the core features that solve it. Arun Kumar Elengovan from Okta, Inc. introduces the 'EPE' strategy where EPE means Eliminate, Prioritize and Execute efficiently. Nick Cherukuri, ThirdEye Gen Inc is defining a single, measurable success metric tied to the core user problem, like rapid hardware prototype design. Ashis Ghosh, Peanut Robotics is advising to create an environment where urgency and prioritization are needed.

articles.title: NEXE Innovations Makes Additional Delivery to ecoBeans Coffee as it Experiences Strong Initial Pickup on Amazon
articles.author: JOIN THE CONVERSATION
articles.summary: ecoBeans Coffee Inc. launched its organic medium roast and dark roast products on Amazon in April 2025. The company reports a significant increase in revenues for the subsequent two-month period, driven by organic customer adoption across Canada. Customer feedback has been positive, with repeat purchases indicating strong customer satisfaction.

articles.title: NYT Strands Hints August 15: Theme, Spangram and answers to solve the Friday puzzle
articles.summary: The New York Times has launched 'NYT Strands,' a new grid-based word puzzle game that challenges players to connect letters and form words sharing a common theme. A defining feature is the inclusion of the Spangram, which spans the grid and encapsulates the day's theme, acting as a guide for uncovering the other answers.

articles.title: TCL brings cutting-edge laundry solutions to South Africa
articles.author: Partnered Content
articles.summary: TCL has launched two new premium front-loading washing machines in South Africa: the TCL P1108FLG 8kg Front Loading Washer Direct Drive and the TCL 10/6Kg C2110WDG Front Loader Washing Machine Wash & Dryer. These models feature TCL's Direct Drive Motor technology and are available at HiFi and Incredible stores.

articles.title: These 32 Amazon 'Internet Famous' Finds Deserve Every Last Bit Of The Hype — And Then Some
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Amazon features trending products in its "Internet Famous" section, including Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder, NeeDoh Ice Berg fidget toy, Eos' Cashmere Lip Butter, and Catrice "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Other featured products are Lottabody's Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse, Kahi Wrinkle Bounce Hydrating Multi-Balm, and L'Oreal Paris Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray Mist, along with numerous skincare, cosmetic and household products.

articles.title: Ezviz RS20 Max review – powerful robot vacuum with detachable mops
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Ezviz launched the RS20 Max, a high-end robot vacuum featuring detachable mops, powerful 13,000Pa suction, and a built-in camera for home security. The RS20 Max has the ability to self-detach its two mop heads whenever it detects carpet. Priced at £499, it includes a mop-washing and drying system within its large base station.

articles.title: To drink or not to drink: SMU researchers' AI tool makes choosing the best wine easy
articles.author: Miriam Fauzia
articles.summary: Researchers at SMU developed an AI system that analyzes sentiment in wine reviews from Wine Spectator to identify the words carrying the most positive or negative sentiment. This system helps consumers understand the emotions and enthusiasm expressed in wine reviews, potentially influencing their purchasing decisions. The AI system analyzes over 140,000 Wine Spectator reviews written between 2005 and 2016.

articles.title: Tweak these 5 settings to make your LG smart TV feel brand new
articles.author: Anthony Marcusa
articles.summary: LG has introduced new AI-powered features to personalize audio and video settings on its smart TVs. A revamped remote control offers enhanced search functionality, voice recognition, and mouse-like pointer capabilities. The new TVs also include a virtual assistant and AI concierge to optimize the entertainment experience and assist users in finding content.

articles.title: 'Compact, plastic-free, and powerful' – my new go-to travel haircare duo
articles.author: Sarah Bradbury
articles.summary: The Powder Shampoo and Conditioner travel duo has been launched, featuring water-free, powder-to-foam formulas designed for on-the-go use and environmental sustainability. The shampoo invigorates with ingredients like Biotin and Ginseng, while the conditioner adds volume and softness. The reviewer found the products effective, especially for creating volume, and recommends them for travel and simplifying haircare routines.

articles.title: Hoover slashes price on robot vacuum making it £1,000 cheaper than Dyson's model
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Hoover has launched a robot vacuum cleaner with a discounted price of £119, significantly cheaper than Dyson's model. The vacuum features home mapping, smart navigation, and a 4,000 suction power. Additionally, the Hoover 2-in-1 Robot vacuum and mop combination is available for £299, offering simultaneous dust and debris collection.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite Preview: A bestseller in the making?
articles.author: Phone Arena
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Tab S11 and Tab S11 Ultra tablets. The tablets are expected to support the Book Cover Keyboard Slim and will feature the mid-range Exynos 1380 chipset.

articles.title: China's Biwin launches SSD the size of a SIM card
articles.summary: Biwin has launched the Mini SSD, a compact solid-state drive designed for portable devices. The Mini SSD offers sequential read speeds of up to 3,700MB/s and comes in 512GB, 1TB, and 2TB storage capacities. It features IP68 water and dust resistance and is suitable for devices like laptops, tablets, and phones.

articles.title: 7 Affordable Mobile Phone Specifications for the August 17th Competition Prize
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Itel has launched the Itel A70, a new budget-friendly smartphone with a standout feature of 128GB base storage, expandable up to 256GB. This makes the Itel A70 an attractive proposition for budget-conscious consumers prioritizing storage without a hefty price tag.

articles.title: AI-driven vision TV poised to disrupt West Africa's entertainment market
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics launched its Vision AI TV and 2025 TV lineup in West Africa, featuring models across OLED, Neo QLED, QLED, and Crystal UHD. These new TVs include advanced AI features, improved picture quality with glare-free OLED and increased brightness, and smart home integration, positioning them as intelligent lifestyle hubs. The new Neo QLED 8K, OLED, Neo QLED 4K, QLED & Crystal UHD TVs are now available at all authorized Samsung stores nationwide.

articles.title: Samsung fans rushing for £199 'excellent' smartwatch as price drops to £39
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Wowcher is offering the original Samsung Galaxy Watch for £39, a significant price drop from £199. Argos sells the Galaxy Watch Ultra for £399, and Sky offers the Galaxy Watch7 for £9 a month.

articles.title: Call To Think Bigger About Data & AI
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: NAB is leveraging its 'Customer Brain,' a customer intelligence engine, to transform customer data into actionable insights within its engagement channels. This enables hyperpersonalization, enhancing customer experiences and outcomes by tailoring insights to individual behaviors. The initiative is part of a broader effort to promote data-driven problem-solving and innovation throughout the bank.

articles.title: Auntie Anne's Unveils Next-Gen Digital Flagship at CentralWorld
org: Tenant and Retail Business Partnership Development
articles.summary: Central Restaurants Group and GoTo Foods International opened Auntie Anne's newest flagship store at CentralWorld. This location introduces the 'Next-Gen Digital Store' concept, featuring self-order kiosks, cashless payment, and digital signage. The new store design reflects Auntie Anne's refreshed brand identity.

articles.title: TechRap unRap: Which of the new Samsung Galaxy foldables is for you?
articles.author: Julian Cirineo
articles.summary: Samsung's new foldable phones, the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7, feature meaningful upgrades. The Galaxy Z Fold7 is slimmer with a wider AMOLED cover screen, while the Galaxy Z Flip7 has a bigger cover screen. Samsung is also releasing Galaxy Z Flip7 FE, a more accessible entry point into the foldable world. With the Galaxy Z Fold7 or Flip7 FE, 6 months of Google AI Pro and 2TB cloud storage are included at no cost.

articles.title: Azizi Developments Launches Azizi David in Dubai's Strategic Al Jaddaf Area
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Azizi Developments has launched Azizi David, marking its latest premium offering.

articles.title: New products for your busy family – Potty time to mom
articles.author: Chris Worthy
articles.summary: The Super Potty Trainer, available at Walmart and Amazon, is designed to help children transition from a child's potty to a regular toilet. GoldBug launched the Glow Mirror ($30, available from Amazon and Walmart), a wide mirror with remote-controlled, multi-colored LED lights and the 5-in-1 Car Seat and Nursing Cover ($19.99, available from Target). FlipBelt ($37+, flipbelt.com) is introduced as a running belt that can hold essentials. Just for Teens UV Patches ($8.99 for a package of 36, available on Amazon) and Dinghy Soaps ($7.50, dinghysoaps.com) are also new products.

articles.title: Celebrities are marketing products directly to their fans
articles.summary: John Legend launched his own skincare brand. Stars are starting their own companies and marketing products directly to their fans.

articles.title: NewidHost- PURE SSD Dedicated Server Hosting for your peace of mind special 41 percent OFF
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: Newid Host, an Indonesian hosting provider established in 2012, offers web hosting, VPS, dedicated servers, and other digital services. They aim to ensure website availability and provide peace of mind to their customers.

articles.title: Mahindra Freedom NU Event: NU.IQ Platform Debuts With Vision S, T, X, And SXT Concepts
articles.author: Before Content
articles.summary: Mahindra launched its Freedom_NU platform, a modular architecture supporting multiple powertrain options. This platform will underpin future C-segment SUVs like the Vision.S, Vision.T, Vision.SXT, and Vision.X, with production expected to start in 2027. The platform is designed for both domestic and international markets.

articles.title: 'My hair SAVIOUR': The best dry shampoos we've tested for fresh, voluminous locks - including a £5 hero and a growth-boosting bestseller
articles.author: LYDIA WHEATLEY
articles.summary: Several companies have recently launched or updated their dry shampoo products. JVN Hair introduced The Essential Dry Shampoo, while TYPEBEA launched G.5 3-in-1 Dry Shampoo formulated to encourage hair growth. Other offerings include Hair Gain Peptide Puff Dry Shampoo, MONDAY Haircare Original Dry Shampoo, ARKIVE Headcare The Reset Dry Shampoo, Living Proof Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo, Moroccanoil Dry Shampoo Light Tones, Batiste Dry Shampoo Original, amika Perk Up Ultra Oil Control Dry Shampoo, Ouai Super Dry Shampoo Melrose Place, and K18 Biomimetic Hairscience AirWash Dry Shampoo, each with unique features like oil absorption, scent, and hair strengthening properties.

articles.title: Clean patios, dirty cars or algae off fences in seconds with Lidl's new gadget & you'll save £68 compared to Bosch
articles.author: Jordan Farrell
articles.summary: LIDL is launching the Parkside Pressure Washer for £60, a budget-friendly alternative to the Bosch version. Additionally, LIDL is set to launch a 15-in-1 kitchen appliance offering over 600 pre-installed recipes, voice control, and automatic programs for kneeding and steaming.

articles.title: Clean patios, dirty cars or algae off fences in seconds with Lidl's new gadget & you'll save £68 compared to Bosch
articles.author: Jordan Farrell
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Parkside Pressure Washer, a budget-friendly gadget for cleaning patios, cars, and fences, available from August 24th. Additionally, Lidl is set to launch a 15-in-1 kitchen appliance with over 600 pre-installed recipes and voice control, offering a cheaper alternative to designer versions.

articles.title: NewidHost - BEST Cloud Hosting for your peace of mind - special 41 percent discount
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: Newid Host, an Indonesian company established in 2012, provides web hosting, VPS, dedicated servers, and related digital services.

articles.title: Google Teases Pixel 10 Pro Fold Before Aug 20 Launch — Design, Camera & Display Hinted (WATCH)
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: Google has unveiled a teaser for the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a next-generation foldable gadget, ahead of its August 20 launch. The phone features a high-end design, IP68-rated construction, camera and screen improvements, a 120Hz refresh rate on the foldable display, and a bigger, brighter cover screen. It's powered by the new Tensor G5 processor and will be available for purchase on October 9, alongside the Pixel Watch 4 and Buds 2a.

articles.title: Australia's cult froyo brand Yo-Chi makes Singapore debut at Orchard Central
articles.summary: Yo-Chi, an Australian self-serve frozen yogurt and acai brand, has launched its first overseas outlet in Singapore on August 15th. The store offers a variety of frozen yogurt flavors made with Australian milk, along with toppings like mochi, brownie, and Singapore-exclusive coconut jelly, operating on a pay-by-weight system.

articles.title: Australia's famed self-serve yogurt brand Yo-Chi opens first international outlet at Orchard Central
articles.author: Eunice Quek
articles.summary: Yo-Chi, an Australian self-serve yogurt and acai brand, has launched its first overseas outlet at Orchard Central in Singapore on August 15. The outlet features a self-serve, pay-by-weight concept with various yogurt flavors and toppings, including Singapore-exclusive options, with prices starting at $3.50 for 100g.

articles.title: Aldi launch Only Fans for fans and the comments are unreal
articles.author: TLE
articles.summary: Aldi launched a marketing campaign styled as an "Only Fans" parody to promote their Specialbuys fans, including neck and handheld fans, available in stores. Customers can enter a draw for a voucher by commenting 'subscribe' on Aldi's Instagram post. The Neck and Handheld fans will be available for £4.99 each from August 21st.

articles.title: 27 Breathable Pieces From Old Navy
articles.author: Gabrielle Moss
articles.summary: The article features a wide variety of clothing items appropriate for summer weather. The collection includes a loose-fit jersey jumpsuit, oversized T-shirt, mini shirt dresses, maxi dresses, linen-blend items, and activewear, all available in a range of sizes and colors with discounted pricing. Old Navy's floral maxi dress received positive feedback on the website.

articles.title: Ola Electric's Sankalp 2025: What you can expect
articles.summary: Ola is entering the sports scooter segment with a new product. Teaser campaigns suggest a sportier design, AI-powered features via Krutrim technology, and advanced software upgrades.

articles.title: Cleanville Laundromat offering clean clothes and convenience
articles.author: Katie Castellani
articles.summary: Cleanville Laundromat, owned by James Manzo and Angela, launched in December offering washing, drying, folding, pick-up, and delivery services. Customers can utilize DoorDash or Uber for pick-up and delivery. Future plans include adding dry-cleaning services through partnerships.

articles.title: Why DTC brands, like Casper, Harry's, and Native, are selling their goods in the retail stores they sought to disrupt
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Direct-to-consumer (DTC) brands such as Harry's, Casper, Native, BarkBox, Quip, Lola, Modern Fertility, Bonobos, Stryx, and Public Goods are partnering with major retailers like Target, Walmart, and CVS to expand customer reach. This involves making their products available in physical stores and leveraging retail partnerships. Quip, for example, now sees retail as its number one source of sales and BarkBox introduces the brand to more consumers through sales of stand-alone toys and treats in Target.

articles.title: NxtGen launches 'M' India's 1st open source AI platform
articles.author: Shristi Acharya
articles.summary: NxtGen, a cloud-based services and datacenter provider, has launched 'M', India's first open-source AI platform. 'M' converts human intent into real-world actions and allows businesses, startups, and public agencies to translate ideas into practical applications, switching between AI models and tools to optimize building websites or booking services.

articles.title: Australian Cult-favourite Yogurt Brand, Yo-Chi, Opens First Singapore Outlet with Snaking Queue Ahead of Launch
articles.author: Irone Kim
articles.summary: Yo-Chi, an Australian frozen yogurt brand, has launched its first international store in Singapore at Orchard Central. The store features a self-serve frozen yogurt and açaí experience with yogurts made with real Australian milk that are low in calories and fat. Customers can personalize their yogurt cups and açaí bowls with various toppings, including localized options like coconut jelly and nata de coco.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold7 & Flip7: New Phones, Faith Edition
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, Z Flip7, and Z Flip7 Fe, which represent advancements in mobile technology through flexible displays and AI integration. The Galaxy Z Fold7 focuses on productivity with its large screen and AI-powered features, while the Galaxy Z Flip7 emphasizes style and convenience with its redesigned FlexWindow and enhanced camera capabilities. The Z Flip7 Fe aims to make folding technology more accessible.

articles.title: Is Amazon testing a cheaper color Kindle?
articles.author: Business Ghana
articles.summary: Amazon's Kindle may soon feature a color screen, as images shared by a Reddit user reveal a prototype device called "Kindle Petit Color." The device name may not be finalized yet, but it showcases a smaller Kindle version with a color display.

articles.title: Azizi Developments Launches Azizi David in Dubai's Strategic Al Jaddaf Area
articles.summary: Azizi Developments has launched Azizi David, a new premium residential project in Al Jaddaf, Dubai, featuring studios, apartments, and penthouses with various amenities. The official unveiling event is scheduled for August 18, 2025, offering prospective homeowners a first look and opportunity to secure a unit.

articles.title: Bunnings launches $1 mini version of iconic bucket
articles.author: Claudia Poposki
articles.summary: Bunnings has released a new product, a 600mL mini bucket, priced at $1. The product is a smaller version of the popular 10-liter bucket and is being used for various purposes such as storing items and planting. The mini buckets are proving very popular with Bunnings customers.

articles.title: Evertune: $15 Million Series A Raised For Scaling AI Marketing Platform
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Evertune, an AI marketing and GEO platform, received $15 million in Series A funding. The company plans to use the funding to expand its marketing tools and develop new ad solutions to optimize brand presence across the AI landscape.

articles.title: Yerba Madre's "Watermelody" Marks First Seasonal Flavor, First Yellow Can Under New Name
articles.author: Yerba Madre
articles.summary: Yerba Madre launched Watermelody, a seasonal release and the first product under its new brand name and refreshed can design. This launch signifies a new phase of regenerative innovation for the company, formerly known as Guayakí Yerba Mate.

articles.title: CosmicUp Launches All-in-One Subscription Platform
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: CosmicUp is launching its all-in-one AI subscription service. The platform provides unlimited access to generative AI models for text, code, and image generation through a single monthly subscription plan.

articles.title: Butter Luxe Co And Little Ardroy Beef Company Crowned Champions At New World Emerge 2025
articles.author: Skills ...
articles.summary: Butter Luxe Co's Oaty Butter, a novel oat spread, and Little Ardroy Beef Company's Beef Bites, a range of frozen ready-to-cook beef pieces, were winners at the New World Emerge competition. As winners, these companies gained the opportunity to have their products stocked in New World stores nationwide. This initiative supports local Kiwi businesses and introduces new, innovative food products to consumers.

articles.title: Vaseline India takes brand storytelling to new heights with first-ever launch in the clouds
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Vaseline India has launched Vaseline Cloud Soft Light Moisturiser, a light face moisturizer, with a #LaunchInTheClouds event at Skydive Dubai. Influencers experienced the product's texture mid-air and were hosted at a Cloud Soft Sensory Lounge featuring immersive zones. The launch reflects Vaseline's entry into face moisturizing, combining hydration with a lightweight texture to meet evolving consumer preferences.

articles.title: DigiDrub Launches The Vinci Studio: An AI-Human Platform for On-Demand Content Creation & Digital Marketing
articles.author: Digi Drub
articles.summary: DigiDrub has launched The Vinci Studio, a platform that combines AI with human creativity to deliver premium marketing content. It allows businesses to create professional-grade marketing assets and offers ongoing SEO and digital marketing programs. DigiDrub plans to expand The Vinci Studio's offerings, including building traditional and e-commerce websites.

articles.title: How may (A)I help you; Darwinbox bags OTPP funds
articles.summary: Darwinbox has secured $40 million in funding from Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan (OTPP). Cyient plans to leverage its IP rights through Cyient Semiconductors to scale design capabilities in power management and machine-to-machine communication. Myntra introduced a zero-commission structure for brands in the women's ethnic wear space.

articles.title: Google Photos just put all its best editing tools a tap away - here's the shortcut
articles.author: Artie Beaty
articles.summary: Google introduced a new "Create" tab in Google Photos, accessible on both Android and iOS. This tab offers editing tools designed to enhance user creativity with photos. The "Create" tab appears alongside existing Photos, Collections, and Ask tabs.

articles.title: Ezviz RS20 Max review: a powerful £500 robot vacuum with unique mop tech
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Ezviz has launched the RS20 Max, a high-specification robot vacuum featuring detachable mops and a built-in camera for home security. The RS20 Max boasts 13,000Pa of suction power and a CutFree brush system and is priced at £499. Its detachable mop heads address issues with carpets, and the camera offers a unique home monitoring function.

articles.title: Best Generative Engine Optimization Companies 2025: Algomizer Tops the List
articles.summary: Algomizer, a Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) company, is launching its services to help brands improve visibility in AI platforms like ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity. The company's methods aim to secure prime placement in generative search results and improve brand presence through proprietary LLM optimization techniques.

articles.title: 27 Ways To Look A *Lot* More Put-Together With Only A *Little* Bit Of Effort
articles.author: Ana Maria Glavan
articles.summary: The article highlights various new or updated products available on Amazon, spanning categories such as beauty, fashion, and personal care. Noteworthy items include I Dew Care dry shampoo, Maybelline Dream BB Cream, Supergoop! Glowscreen SPF 40, Goody spin hair pins, Fanola purple shampoo, Nooni Appleberry Lip Oil, Cake Beauty The Curl Friend Defining Cream, Elizabeth Mott brow gel and Hanes wire-free bra. These products aim to enhance personal care routines and fashion choices, with a focus on convenience, effectiveness, and customer satisfaction.

articles.title: Shoppers rush to Dyson Afterpay Day sale with up to 50 per cent off vacuums, hair tools and fans
articles.author: Ariana Pezeshki
articles.summary: Dyson has announced significant discounts on a wide range of its products as part of its Afterpay Day event. The sale includes reduced prices on vacuums like the V15 Detect Absolute and Cyclone V10 Absolute, haircare tools such as the Airwrap multi-styler and Airstrait straightener, and purifiers like the Purifier Hot+Cool HP2 De-NOx.

articles.title: Mahindra introduces NU_IQ platform, unveils four new SUV design concepts
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Mahindra & Mahindra introduced the NU_IQ platform. This modular architecture will underpin a new range of SUVs.

articles.title: Amazon expands grocery service
articles.author: Rapid City Journal
articles.summary: Amazon is introducing a new service for Prime members. This service enables them to order groceries, such as blueberries and milk, along with everyday items like batteries and T-shirts. Customers can expect to receive their orders within hours.

articles.title: Sims 4 Reveals 2 New Creator Kits for August 2025
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: The Sims 4 announced the upcoming availability for purchase of a new product: a pair of Creator Kits. These kits represent a new offering within The Sims 4 ecosystem.

articles.title: Mahindra Freedom NU live updates: Vision S, X, T, SXT concept to be showcased
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Mahindra is showcasing the Freedom NU and the Vision S X T SXT concept. This indicates the potential unveiling of a new product or design direction by the company.

articles.title: Ten of the best pieces to shop from the new Topshop collection
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: Topshop launched a brand new collection featuring oversized knits, Joni jeans, and slinky silk dresses.

articles.title: Boots offering 'early access' to sell out No7 beauty calendars ahead of Christmas
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: No7 is providing exclusive early access to its advent calendars and introducing two new additions to the product line.

articles.title: Lumen Technologies Surpasses 1,000 Customers With Naas Growth
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: Lumen Technologies has achieved a significant milestone by exceeding 1,000 customers on its growing Network-as-a-Service platform. This success highlights the company's advancements in providing network solutions.

articles.title: From Productivity AI to Personal AI: Macaron AI, the World's First Personal Agent, Officially Launches, ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A new company launched , a Personal Agent AI, aiming to help users live better instead of focusing on office tasks.  is now available in North America (English) and Japan (Japanese).

articles.title: Yerba Madre's "Watermelody" Marks First Seasonal Flavor, First Yellow Can Under New Name
articles.author: Elko Daily Free Press
articles.summary: A brand's milestone release underscores its category leadership and signals a bold new phase of regenerative innovation, implying a new product or service launch.

articles.title: Fresh launches drive surge in new private home sales in July
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: The launch of Lyndenwoods in the Science Park district led to an increase in sales.
